alert.note: Alert for Clayton (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 13 at 1:17AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwest Wisconsin through 145 AM CDT... At 117 AM CDT, trained weather spotters reported strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Necedah to near Muscoda to near Holy Cross. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Necedah around 120 AM CDT. Dellwood around 125 AM CDT. Friendship and Adams around 135 AM CDT. Dickeyville around 140 AM CDT. Cuba City and Hazel Green around 145 AM CDT. This includes Interstate 90/94 between mile markers 59 and 86. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
